channel.title: math.GM updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GM updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Insolvability of $x^x = a$ in elementary functions
item.description: arXiv:2312.02174v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In a recent paper "Solvability of equations in elementary functions" [arXiv:1911.10409] the insolvability in elementary functions of equation $\tan(x) - x = a$ was proved. This work applies the same topological method to prove the insolvability of equation $x^x = a$.
item.dc:creator: Alexey Kanel-Belov, Rodion Zaytsev
